content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 64-71)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) (EntityStatus.WORKING, 180-182 water/60s)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) (19-30/50 coal, 180-182 steam/60s)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) (13,500 kW continuous output)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) containing 200 coal
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (19 coal, waiting status)

### Oil Production System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (299,980 crude oil remaining, 838-859/60s extraction)
- Storage tank network:
  - (22.5,40.5): 8.30-12.45 crude oil
  - (27.5,40.5): 1.36-1.52 crude oil
  - (32.5,40.5): 0.06-0.08 crude oil
  - (37.5,40.5): Empty (new status)
- Connected pipe network (crude oil system operational)

## ERROR TIPS

### System Monitoring Improvements
- Implement automated alerts for:
  - Boiler fuel levels (currently manual monitoring)
  - Storage tank capacity thresholds
  - Burner inserter idle states

### Maintenance Procedures
- Scheduled fuel replenishment before reaching critical levels (currently at 19/50 coal)
- Implement secondary water pipeline as redundancy
- Create emergency power backup plan

### Expansion Planning
- Verify all upgrade locations meet:
  - Space requirements for solar array
  - Terrain for advanced oil processing
  - Power network capacity for expansions

### Automation Gaps
- Current coal delivery requires manual intervention
- No automated alerts for system status changes
- Limited redundancy in critical systems (single water line)

### Performance Optimization
- Monitor crude oil throughput variations (838-859/60s)
- Track power network voltage fluctuations (181,500-210,000)
- Analyze steam production consistency (±0.3% variation)
